Package mainenviro

Class Battle

java.lang.Object
mainenviro.Battle
public class Battle extends Object
The battle class is the class that allow's the user to fight enemy monster's This class has the ability to reduce health of user's monster, collect gold and use items

  • Constructor Details

    • Battle

      public Battle(GameEnviro game)
      Main Battle Constructor
      Parameters:
      game - , take's the game environment to be able to get user's monsters and items Creates a random number of battles between 3 and 5 from random monsters Since a new battle class is created daily, new monster's appear daily

    • getAttackDefence

      public int[] getAttackDefence(Monster monster, int choice)
      Method to obtain the attack and defense statistics given a monsters fight choice
      Parameters:
      monster - , a monster within the fight
      choice - , which fight choice the monster choose
      Returns:
      attackDefence, an array of size two, [0] is attack statistics, [1] is defence statistics

    • setEnemyChoice

      public String setEnemyChoice()
      Method to randomly select the enemy's fight option Can be 0 to 3 if enemy has Energy Can be 0 or 2 if enemy has no energy
      Returns:
      enemyChoice, an integer representing the enemies choice

      public int userDamage(int monsterDefence, int opponentAttack)

      Parameters:

      opponentAttack - the opponent attack

    • enemyDamage

      public int enemyDamage(int monsterDefence, int opponentAttack)

      opponentAttack - the opponent attack
      Returns:
      the int

    • fight

      public int[] fight()
      Fights the two monster's based on their current fight choices. Calls on other methods to calculate the damage dealt to both monsters
      Returns:
      the int[], the damage inflicted on both monsters [0] is the damage dealt to the user's monster [1] is the damage dealt to the enemy's monster

    • goldWon

      public int goldWon()
      Only called after the enemy win's Calculates the gold won from battle. Gold won is based on enemy's buy price, randomness between 80% and 120% and user game difficulty
      Returns:
      the gold won during battle

    • enemyDead

      public void enemyDead()
      Method called when the enemy is dead, even if user also dies. Updates battle statistics Removes enemy as currEnemy and from potential battles list

    • userDead

      public void userDead()
      method called when the user is dead, even if the enemy also dies. Set's the currUser to null

    • checkEnemyDead

      public boolean checkEnemyDead()
      Checks if the enemy is dead.
      Returns:
      true, if dead

    • checkUserDead

      public boolean checkUserDead()
      Check if the user is dead.
      Returns:
      true, if dead
